content.detailedDescription:
My mother was driving me to pick up my paycheck.  we'd just left my apartment on schertz parkway in schertz, texas and were heading west to i35. i was leaning my head on the passenger window when i noticed the reflection of something in the glass out of the corner of my eye.  i turned to look right expecting to see some f-15's flying towards randolph air force base since it's one town over.  instead, i saw two, huge, hovering silvery things, for lack of a better word.  they were oval in shape, grayish-silver, reflective but like a brushed nickel.  no identifying marks, windows, or lights were on these craft.  

i shouted at my mom to look.  she turned and looked and said "what the hell is that?"

i begged her to pull over or turn around.  at first, she didn't want to.  then she u-turned and we came back around to the same spot.  i looked out the window over the cow fields (there are homes there now) on the corner of schertz parkway and live oak road.  their was absolutely no sound coming from these things and they seemed to be hovering very low, not even perceptibly moving.  the one on the left suddenly shot straight up and was gone in the blink of an eye.  the one on the right, hovered off backwards away from us, slightly behind a treeline, then it too, shot straight up and was gone.  it was incredible.  i couldn't believe what i'd just seen in broad daylight, at noonish, no less.  there were no clouds in the sky that day.  

we never reported this to anyone because mom thought people would think we were crazy.  i pointed out that we both saw it, not just one of us.  the funny thing is, she swears we got out of the car and walked to the fenceline, but i don't remember ever getting out of the car.  i would remember something like that since i have a physical handicap that required her help to get out of her low vehicle.  that's the only discrepancy in both our stories.  i lived far too close to where this occured, nearly across the street!  i spent the next year scared every night when i went to bed.  

i don't know if the air force base caught anything on radar, but i did notice increased air traffic over schertz that afternoon.  perhaps they have a file.  there were about two to three other vehicles driving by at the time.  maybe someone else reported a sighting, but we were the only ones to pull over and look.
content.summary: Two oval, silvery objects, large, and hovering.  no lights or identifying marks.

content.detailedDescription:
I live quite a way from town so it is very dark where i live. i was taking a ride (on our dirt road) to get past the thick pines and oaks so i could see the stars and perhaps some "shooting" stars. the night was very clear and cold.
i was driving about 15 mph looking up at the sky out my windshield when a light to my left caught my eye. looking out my (driver's) side window i caught sight of a round light going faster than i -comming from behind me on my left just above the tree line-it was angled downwards. i saw it between some if the trees and then it went behind the trees and the mountain to my left. my first thought was that thing is going to "go down"-meaning hit the ground-but then my brain finally caught up to the event and i almost felt sick to my stomache. it had a light of it's own-no "sparkle" like a star. more like a flat kitchen light with a lense-a perfect cirlce of opaque light. there was no tail, no streaks, no sparkle.  it must have been huge-it came from higher up but dipped below the tree line-instead of looking the size of a speck like a star or an earing stud like a planet-this filled my vision like a baseball just outside my window would.The area it went over is blm property-so it was not a house-and it just wasn't that kind of light. 
i stopped the car for a moment-trying to see if there was any kind of fireball-i saw none. i was shaking, but took off toward the area it went to see if i could see it again-the road ran out-and it is all wilderness and a river gully-i never saw any hint of it again. i went up to a higher spot but saw nothing. i still can't quite grasp what i saw. i know i saw it-just can't get my brain around it because there is no explanation for that kind of a light behaving in that way. the only "earthly" explanation would be that beal afb is about 45 miles away-and they perhaps were testing something not meant to be seen. it was no airplane headlights and not a meteor. i've seen planty of both. 
thanks for listening-had to tell someone-
l. glass
content.summary: White disc-had light of it's own

content.detailedDescription: I was ready to go to sleep and looked out the window and saw 2 very round non blinking lights and what appeared to be a triangle shape.  it moved very slowly almost like a balloon floating throught the sky.  i thought there is know way this is a plane i then ran up and told my mom. i just froze and had a feeling of just knowing it to be a ufo.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object with 3 round lights and small red.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from deleon texas toward dublin....Was  about 5 miles out of    
deleon...When 4 or 5 very bright circles appeared in the sky....3 large and 2 smaller....It appeared that the smaller ones moved toward the large one like a child to its mother, very very  fast then they shot upward what looked like they disappeared behind the clouds none of this lasted very long....Lights were very bright nothing else was in the sky....I had  no  idea what these were, but i knew they were not jets, jets do not move that fast... did not mention this to anyone but i did see where a couple my age noticed the same thing....
content.summary: 4 or 5 bright circles ; west of dublin

content.detailedDescription:
Our flat faces west looking out over the city of london. my wife and i noticed a bright light within the vicinity of tower bridge moving towards our flats. thought it was a helicopter, but as it got closer flying west to east looked more orange and very bright. object was moving fast. thought it might be a chinese lantern, but its velocity and the fact that there is only a very light breeze would discount that.
as the object 'flew' over, there was no sound whatsoever. the light was very bright orange. we are used to seeing helicopters flying over london all the time and this was definately not a chopper. 
after passing over our flats, the object proceeded for a bit before appearing to ascend and then fade out. within seconds a police helicopter (presumably) flew in and commenced circling the area for about 10 minutes or so before flying off west over liverpool street.
weather conditions were high-level overcast, very light breeze and mild. most peculiar.
content.summary: Bright orange light moving fast- west to east over city of london followed by helicopter circling where it dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving across hwy 40 i think through arizona'a petrified forest.  it was about 7:30 pm and i saw a ball of light a little larger than a star fly at a super fast speed.  it was right at the top of my windshield, so pretty low and it zigzagged from left to right and then burst out into the atmosphere.  i knew it wasn't a falling star because it went from inside our atmosphere out to space.  it flew at a tremendous amount of speed.  no terrestrial craft i know of could maneuver like that.
content.summary: Ball of light i thought was a star zigzagged super fast, then flew out the atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: At 2140hrs i went outside with my dogs to allow them to relieve themselves before going to bed. there were no clouds in the sky and as i waited i was looking at the stars. i was facing orion when i noticed movement between his belt and the horizon. i was facing approximately 100 to 105 degrees and they were 20 degrees above the horizon.  there were five objects in close formation one slightly higher than the rest. the lower four seemed to be changing positions. the objects did not appear to be projecting any light. they did appear to be reflecting light. if there had only been one i would have of thought it was just a satellite, although i have never seen a satellite orbit in that direction.  the formation was moving up and to the south. i then ran inside and got my wife out of bed and showed her the formation from the bedroom window. we both then went back outside and watched the formation continue until they faded away. the higher they got the less light appeared to reflect. the light steadily diminished and when we couldn���t see them anymore my wife went back inside. i then looked at my watch and it was 2145hrs. the start time was an estimate. as i stood there trying to get another glimps a meteor came across the sky from the east to south. i then called my uncle up in utah and told him the story. i made the call at 2150hrs. it was a beutiful night to be looking up!
content.summary: Five objects that resembled a cluster of satellites. four of them kept changing positions.

content.detailedDescription: Was on state hwy 54 headed south. saw a black triangle at about 700 ft altitude flying northwest towards holloman afb. i could not tell its exact size but i believe its around the size of a fighter jet.  i told several friends about this, one of which knows several airmen. the airman said it was not a ufo but the replacement for the f-117. they call it "the raven". now we know. those arent ufo's, they are america's latest stealth birds.
content.summary: Saw triangle craft. its called "the raven".

content.detailedDescription:
An amber ball of light rose from the ocean at pescadero beach and came toward (15 miles)us to skyline blvd (1000') where one can see the ocean and bay area in palo alto county. i was very large when it stopped in front of us (1200'from sea level and 200' from us)i jumped out and was waving to it (no sound the whole time, stopped or moving) we had a toyota landcruiser with an external movable spot light. i used it to direct the beam to the  amber ball of light that was stationary.  and used a sos code from the spot light.  then the object moved smoothly to the left, then to the right, then diagonally both ways as if it was responding to the sos signal sent by me.  i repeated that code about 10 times, and it responded to that code repeatedly. the communication lasted over 20 minutes, the in less of a second left a com trail and disappeared in space with no sound.

the second siting nights later as we were traveling to home on hwy 9 from skyline blvd, the same type of amber ball of light was traveling between the mountains but looked like it was in trouble spuing molten flames as it irratically moving up and down with little control then disappeared behind the moutains.

the third siting nights later on skyline blvd where one can see the entire bay area and ocean at the same time, there was a grid network of perfically clear com trails over the entire bay area only about 850' above sea level (and we were about 1000')  they were about 10 to 20 mile squares and did not dissapate like normal com trails from a jet or other sources. turned off of hwy 9 to go home and lost site. we never saw anything that strange before or after and we traveled that route for ove 25 years at that same time (commuting from swing shift)

i called the san jose news and talked to betty barnical to ask if anything had been reported.  first she discibed the same amber ball of light around that same time, but it was only seen in pheonix, ar.
content.summary: Came from pescadero beach ocean to1200' towards us and responded to sos signal

content.detailedDescription:
I was doing my make up by the window, think i was getting ready for work. i was looking out the window at the clear blue sky then looked at the leaves of a tree in my garden and suddenly notice just next to the outline of the tree was a silver/metalic looking triangle, perfectly still in the air, isosceles shaped, don't know how big it was as i couldn't tell how far away it was, perhaps a couple of millimeters in the sky from my eye line.

i just stared at it for a while wondering what it could be, i was sort of holding my breath and heart beating fast with excitement as it was bizarre and i couldn't think of what it could be. 
after a while of staring at it i thought to myself, that there could be any number of explanations, there was no one else in the house to tell and i certainly didn't plan on telling people i was seeing things in the sky as i would sound like i was mentally ill. 

i looked away to continue getting ready, still thinking about it and when i looked up again it was gone, so i don't know if it disappeared or moved or was ever even really there.
content.summary: Motionless silver isosceles triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my university with a muslim friend of mine (im an australian thats very much into my philosophy).
we were discussing our ideas of the universe and our interpretations of what we thought god was (i am an atheist, buddhist, philosopher).
while sitting on the porch my friend had his back to the sky while i could see the full sky.
while he was talking about his idea of what happened i started to talk and reply to what he had said when all of a sudden i noticed something shooting from left to right in the sky.
the object was; 
- parallel to the earth in its movement.
- had no flashing lights (like on a plane).
- its movement was incredibly fast.
- it was far too close to the earth (maybe kilometers, its hard to tell with size and distance)to be a meteor and had too much of a round solid shape.
- there was a light like energy following in its trail and what i found interesting is how the light trail dissipated just as quickly as the object moved.

it appeared and was moving very quickly for about 3 seconds then it was out of my view.
my reaction at first was awe. when i don't know how to react to something sometimes i just laugh at it so i had a few giggles at it. i just kept looking in that direction at where it was and tried to get my head around it and think of a reason behind what it may have been. my friend asked what just happened and i wasn't sure what to say from whether he'd believe me or not. 
i decided to tell him and i about 10 seconds after it happened i jumped up and ran to a place were i could see the distance and maybe get another little glimpse. for the speed it was moving it was very unlikely that i would see it so it was gone and we spoke about it and i came home to study objects the fly in the sky that may have been similar(like with the trail of light) and i couldn't find anything to match it so that led me here.
at first i thought it would have been a plane but it was far to quick and i could see the definitive shape of a disc.
content.summary: I was sitting with a friend the sun had just started rising. i saw a ufo pass quickly infront of me.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on a cove on the beach with four friends next to a cliff.  we were watching the sunset.  the sun had just dipped down under the horizon when we saw in the same western direction a unwavering reddish light in the distance heading in a linear path almost towards us.  we all thought it to be an airplane when we first saw it, but the closer it got the more we all agreed that we didn't know what it was.  our popular reaction to it was "wow! what is that?"  it's approach was slow and low which was a factor in helping us determine it was not a plane. and it stayed that way even as it passed 300-400 yards ahead of us.  it was about 400-500 feet in the air.  the object was heading eastbound at about 35-40 mph.  the object just kept going until it was out of view behind the eastern hills.  i will be going around and getting the other witnesses testimonies soon.  my friend ray who was a skeptic till the object damn near came right in front of us, pulled out his cell phone and recorded 15 seconds of the orb.  i will be working on obtaining this footage and attaching it to this case for all to see.
content.summary: Reddish orange orb seen by 5 on southern humboldt's lost coast

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were leaving de leon texas on hwy 6 and just pass the leon river bridge in the clearing i happen to see a flash up in the sky. as i looked i seen 4 sets of lights in a straight line like castle top orange and white in color and very bright like an explosion. and a moment later there was another one to the left of the first. the one on the right disappeared and the left appeared. and for a brief moment they were together.Then they both were gone. they were large in size and did not to appear to be very high in elevation. from highway 6 they were southeastward from me towards coyman,lake proctor, or northwest dublin. stranges thing my mother 76 and i have ever seen.
content.summary: Orange/white lights in a semi straight line in 4 sets, then a second lights the same ,flash and hold then again to the left 2are shown

content.detailedDescription: Witness thought at first that the object was a star but it was seen in the daytime and was twice as large as a star. sighting was called to dispatch by phone because the witness does not own a computer.
content.summary: Gold-colored object seen in the daytime.

content.detailedDescription: I begin in saying that this is not an unordinary event as we see these lights every once in a while outside in our yard .We live way out in the country 8 miles out from a town so at night it is quite easy to see anything in the night sky.We never have reported these sightings as a lot of people do around here as we live 8 miles from stephenville tx and 10 or so miles from dublin texas. but last night we saw the lights at the same level in the sky ..Id say at least 7 of these.It was around dinner time so i was in the kitchen at first and since the lights had been seen lately we had been looking outside once in a while at night. my husband and i walked out  and were only out for a minute and then we saw them...I guess that was a lucky thing.I didnt have to wonder what it was since these lights have been seen here off and on for quite a while now...Guess they like the dairies around this area of texas.The rather round orange lights (that look almost all the same size)just last a few seconds then they disappear.Of course your real excited when we are seeing these lights..And then they are gone (maybe not really gone, just change position so we can no longer see them)..Almost always afterwards we see the blinking of jets and hear the jets coming in the area.Since we had had some news only a couple of weeks ago about the unexplained lights again in the stephenville paper people in this area start looking around at night again to see ufos.Actually we had seen the lights last october and were waiting for this october to look again ..But it was cloudy most of the month.Now it is november and we saw them last night.
content.summary: The objects or lights were orange in color and probably 7 in all in a row

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking on the sidewalk in my neighbourhood which was very quiet at the time in the city of granby in the province of quebec and came to the street corner close to my home. at that moment, the corner of my left eye caught attention of an object in the sky coming in my direction. i estimate it was about 300-500 feet in the air or 5-7 average trees in comparable elevation.  the object, a fireball, was traveling slowly, perfectly horizontally and without a noticeable trail of smoke. there was no smell of burning.  there was no sound at all coming from it. in consideration of its elevation, i approximate the size as about 75-100 feet in diameter, or about the size of a small house.  

what was disquieting about it was its slow speed and its size.  from my available perspective, it took maybe 6 to 8 seconds to travel the distance from when i first noticed it to when it disappeared.  i estimate this distance to be 1500 feet calculated with the help of about 20 houses on the street from my left to my right of the street corner. it disappeared then out of my sight above the houses to my far right.  astonishment was my reaction and i went back home. i always thought it would have been a meteor of some kind and i expected something out of the news or newspapers the next day but nothing noticed was ever mentioned about it. in view of its size, i always thought that if it touched ground somewhere, it would have done some damage and thus reported.
content.summary: Slow moving fireball in quiet neighbourhood

content.detailedDescription:
I experienced visitations regularly as a 4 to 5 year old child, with few experiences after that, i am now 31 years old.

seems like things were always in a dream-like state from bed but i was amazed to read about certain things years later as a teenager to discover that other people had similar experiences. when i was a young child i had no exposure to anything that would plant certain concepts in my mind, especially to the detail of what i remember.

anyways moving on to recently...

i was watching a boomerang shaped thing from below, like i was looking up at it. (this was in a dream?) something landed on a runway while this thing hovered. there was a distant vacuum cleaner/microwave sound coming from it.
then it was like i saw another craft coming in for a landing, but an object on the ground rolled out for it to connect to. then it was pulled along the runway and i saw some type of guard person turn around and look at me. i immediately opened my eyes and was in bed, but i still heard the sound. immediately after i opened my eyes there was some kind of blue beam about the diameter of a large honeydew melon that pulsed at my neck/shoulder region 3 times in about a 2 second instance. i could feel it, not painful, but was tingly and i know i was awake at that point. i looked at the clock and it was 3:15 am.

i laid awake on bed awake for a couple of hours before going back to sleep.

i looked at the ceiling the next day but didn't see anything unusual.

this was unique and unlike any of my previous experiences from years ago which were all similar, but even though it apparently was a dream, i was awake when the beam thing happened, no doubt in my mind at all.
i am a high level it engineer of sound mind with a happy family. i don't know what this was but it happened, and i know there is something going on. 

3 days ago my 4 year old woke me up at 3:33 am crying and very scared, complaining that he had a nightmare about a scary man who took him into space. this bothers me because i am a christian and i am trying to understand the nature and source of these experiences. i never really had a "good vibe" from my experiences. 
i have never reported anything to anyone before outside of certain close friends and family. anyways hope this helps somehow.

when i was a child, it always started with an array of vertical light bars moving across the wall in front of me, followed by feeling like i was sliding out of myself and floating to the ceiling. there were things around my bed doing something to my body. i have one faint memory of being submerged in a tank full of green liquid with black hose things everywhere, and other people too. one other memory that stands out is a bunch of little white guys sort of floating and sliding around in what seems like a huge very brightly lit shopping mall. they all had big black eyes just like in the typical descriptions. there were a lot of them. i was about 4 or 5.

the rest of those types of experiences consisted of feeling paralyzed after "sliding out of myself" and feeling very afraid, and feeling strange pressures on my legs or hips just before waking up. i would also always have a blood pool on my pillow  and sheets as my nose would be bleeding profusely.
content.summary: Viewing boomerang from below but immediately found myself in bed with blue beam 3 pulses to the neck/shoulder area as i "woke up"

content.detailedDescription:
Walking out to my deck i noticed a very bright twinkling sorta strobing  in the east an southeast horizon . i would say that if you were to hold up your index finger at arms length thats the distance from the horizon it stayed for the 5 hrs. that i watched it. it did not appear to movve at all. i have  25x100 astronomy binoculars which i viewed it with an i saw a partially red top and the rest just seemed to be constantly strobing, getting really dim at times to very very bright. this was wed. 11/18/09 7 pm til i went to bed.

 dateline 11/19/09, once again walked out on my back deck and the object was there and now i am very alarmed because its cloudy and raining. im continuing to watch the object and its  raining harder and no other sky is exposed anywhere. came inside to check the radar and its covered in clouds and precepitation. the light is there thru the clouds and rain  and i can say ive never herd or seen such a thing in my life. i am hoping that this will be reported on more extensivly. thanks for your service.
content.summary: A bright flashing strobing light low on the eastern horizon

content.detailedDescription:
This is the second occurance at our home.  the first event i was sitting in my recliner watching tv when i looked outside because i saw a bright light.  i went outside and saw six bright star-like stationary objects.  no sound and not moving. i called my wife out to look and when she got there the lights had dimmed and then started blinking very fast.  they hovered above us for about 30 seconds again blinking very fast.  suddenly they just moved away very fast, again no sound.  below is the way it looked to us.
         
                   *       *        *       *

                       *        *        *
the second occurance just happened last night.  i was sitting again in my recliner watching tv when i saw another bright light.  i went outside and saw 3 bright star-like stationary objects - i hurriedly called my wife out again to look and as she came out she did happen to see the bright light but it dimmed.  we ran to our dock, we live on a lake, to see clearer and there were a lot of stars out but these three lights were moving with no sound.  we did see a few aircraft moving in the area but we could tell what they were with the sound but these other objects were definitely unidentifiable.  as we watched they just moved away but traveled together.  

we were estatic to see these unidentifiable objects because up until this time we just did not really believe they existed.  now we know they do.  they may not be aliens but they were certainly ufo's. i  had my cell phone but was unable to get any pictures fast enough.  i need to purchase a better camera when these events occur.  

          *       *        this is the way it looked on second occurance.

               *
content.summary: Two occurances where we saw star-like objects hovering overhead - no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Report was taken by mufon dispatch (stephen cox)

3 - 6 lights in a straight line flashing, 

objects were a long distance away the size of this was monstrous, 
 
witness was off highway 6, 

the lights were very bright orange, 

jets were chasing objects and a lot smaller than this object, 

viewed for 45 sec to a minute. 

a friend saw the object in abilene, 7 witnesses in stephenville ,

a friend who is a police officer has a dashboard video but does not in anyway what his name used.
 
witness has pictures and video and can get pictures and videos from other witnesses
content.summary: 3 - 6 lights in a streight line flashing

content.detailedDescription:
I was about to go to sleep and was gazing at the stars and airplanes taking off at lax.
since i have been seeing these light balls falling from the sky on a regular basis i was looking for them again. i do not report all of them because at first i thought they may be falling stars
but the sky is not that clear.
however last night the one i saw amazed me so i had to report it.
it came out of nowhere like they usually do but this one was very large and very low.
it was just above my telephone pole.
it was a golden ball the size of a basketball and was coming from the east of my neighbors
back yard headed west towards the ocean.
it seemed to be just above the high line wires and was not a falling star because it was flying 
parallel to the flight path and had a golden steamer.
the way it flew was in a roller coaster manner and then went about 1,000 feet and just disappeared.
the weird thing is that it was not headed downwards like a comet or falling star.
i was by myself and could not get my camera in time because it lasted about 7 seconds and
i was glued to the sight of it.
also the fact that i am seeing these so often.
i am considering putting a web cam up now.
content.summary: Golden light ball with streamer

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were traveling north on i-93 towards lincoln nh.
a bright yellowish tint light appeared on my left at about the 10 oclock position. i appeared to just turn on for a few seconds then turn off. i ask my friend if he had seen it and he said no. i instructed him to keep looking to my left to see if it would appear again, in doing so we observed the same light turn on again, then a second one appeared to the left of it. they appeared to be hovering at first glance. we then pulled over to watch them, then within approximatley 15-20 seconds they turned off again. i then took out my iphone and began recording what was happening. at that time one appeared again in view, this is whan i started recording and then another one appeared, then 3, 4 and 5 bright yellowish tint lights about a 1/2 to 3/4 of a mile above the mountain range. at this point it looked as if to take a v shape form. then about 20-30 seconds later they started to turn off again. at this point a nh state trooper had pulled up behind us and came to my window to ask what we were doing, i asked him if he had seen these lights? he responed yes, he says, i noticed two bright yellowish lights about 2 miles back, i ask him if there were any military manuvers going on in the area and he said no. he said at first i thought it might be a plane but these lights appeared to be stationary with little movement. plus he said he listened for any noise but could not hear anything. i also ask him if this could be flares and he siad no, not here in the national forest, plus he said if they were flare you could see them slowly decending with an alluminated trail. at this point he said we had to move on cause we were in a break down lane and that this was not an emergency so we had to leave. now i know there was a meteor shower going on that night, however i have seen plenty of meteor showers in my life and those are showers are in above the earths atmoshere. these lights were visible a half mile to one mile above the the mountain range. these were had notthing to do with a meteor shower. they were way to close and way to bright. i was able to catch a video of these lights, but have not uploaded them yet to this computer, please send me an email address so i can upload this video to you. thanks, ron dagesse
content.summary: Extremely bright light over mountain top, one then two then three, four, five- turning on and off.

content.detailedDescription: It had been a rainy day. at 7:30 i took my pups out for a break. in the distance to the west over the gulf i could see a black cloud in the shape of a y on its side. under the y was a small gold orb doing figure 8's in and under the cloud. it was a goldish yellow color in appearance, i guess due to the sunset. it only lasted a few seconds maybe 3-5 seconds. just long enough to catch my eye and not long enough to be sure you were seeing what you thought you were seeing.  i was standing on my frount porch when the object caught my eye, because it was so bright and moving in and under the black cloud. i did not know what it was but i thought it very curious to see something like this in and  under the black cloud. all of a sudden the yellow gold orb just did not appear again. as if it knew i was watching it. or had some other place to be.It almost appeared to be playing in the cloud.
content.summary: After a rainy day  i went out with pups for a break. to the west i saw a black cloud

content.detailedDescription: I filmed this on 111709,part of a sequence of lights that was going about in the nyc sky. i was looking at the ufo or "craft" hover and stay in one spot in the air while it flickered strange lights.. you can't see it on the film but, a white orb detaches and flies away from the "craft". its the reason i zoom out from the sparkling lights. the gold/white sphere moves at a nice gentle speed over central park. truly amazing. v456
content.summary: Ufo drops fast moving orb.

content.detailedDescription: On november 16th 09 i heard sonic booms at approximately 11am about 2-3 minutes in duration. there were about 3-4.  on novemver 17,09 at 12:10 exactly there was another series of somic booms. this time it was loud enough or close enough it upset my two pups.They began to bark uncontrolably. it took me a minute or two to get them undercontrol again. on november 18th,09 there were more somic boombs at approximately 5:10pm. i have heard these somic boombs before and wondered if it were jets returning to macdill afb in tampa or to the pencicola afb on the panhandle of fla.The sonic booms came from the west of me over the gulf area. but never 3 days in a row.  i was not scared, just a little up set on the 17th of november that the booms upset my pups. they were in their beds when they heard the booms, and were alarmed. they have  never alerted to things like this before.. only to some one comming to the door or something in the yard at night.(deer, wild critters that come into the yard at night)i was in the livingroom kitchen area prepairing meals when i heard the booms.I can hear comercial jets go over and have heard sonic booms before, but never 3 days in a row.From the gulf to the west of me. ( i live 20 miles from the gulf.)it made me a little anxious to think that the booms would upset my two pups so. it took me a minute or two to get them calmed down. as i think back now my two cats were affected by the actions of my two dogs as well. they became aggitated as well.
content.summary: On november 16 , 17, 18 i heard sonic booms.  to the west of me over the gulf region.

content.detailedDescription: Starting on nov 16- nov 18 i have heard sonic booms. on the 16th at 11am there was 3-4 sonic booms, approximately in a three minute duration.Nov. 17-09 between 12:10 and 12:12 there were several sonic booms even my dogs were upset by this episode. they began to bark uncontrolably. on nov.18 at 5:10 there were more sonic booms. i have lived on the space coast most of my life and i know what a sonic boom is. i have heard it when the shuddle comes home and when some of the jets return to patricks afb at melbourn fl.  these sonic booms could have been jets going to macdill in tampa or to pencicola afb in the pan h of handle. i have heard these same sonic booms on several occaasions previously to this but never so frequently.(three days in a row)  i have also seen the ramjet contrails in my vacinity, on several occasions. (smoke on a rope)????                                        on sat. oct. 25 after a rainy day the clouds were finally clearing, only a few dark clouds over the gulf about 7:30 i was out with my pups for a break. there was a dark black cloud over the gulf area like a sideways y (the two arms pointins south) there was a small flash that caught my eye. there seemed to be a bright orb (yellowish gold in color could have been feflecting the sun as it was nearly sunset)skimming along the bottom side of the cloud doing what i would call a figure 8 among the clouds edge.. it only lasted a few seconds.The orb did about 3 of its loops and was gone. just long enough to catch your attention but short enough to make you wonder if you really saw anything.I was curious about both events. i was not afraid, but the sonic booms did upset my dogs, they also heard it. and they normally do not bark unless some one or some thing is outside the house in the yard.They allert to the deer and other night critters that visit out yard but this time it was different.
content.summary: Starting on nov. 16-17-!8- i have heard a sonic boom to the west of me, over the gulf area.

content.detailedDescription: On the 16th of november 2009, at around 9:30pm i was walking my dog around the oval in pretwick, scotland. i was suddenly aware of a strange tension in the air and my hair began to stand on end, beneth the many layers i had wrapped up in because of the winter weather. my dog, saber, an alsatian, began to cower in fear of some unseen object overhead, and began to pull on the leash. i was suddenly very light headed and saw several different combinations of flashing lights above me. i woke up outside the swimming pool in prestwick six hours later, my eyes bloodshot and with an orange liquid coming from my nose.
content.summary: Large, metallic, covered in different coloured flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I do not know the exact date but this is coming from my mothers father. 
   he said he was in his house when he heard buzzing noise in his front yard. when he looked out a ufo had set down in his front yard. he saw lights but no aleins. after a few minutes it left. he had no doubt that it was a ufo.( we do have an airforces base here also)
  afterwards pertrified stone and wood coulds be found where the crsft had sat down. after about 12-15 years a perfect circle can still be seen in the front yard. the best time to see this is in the summer because the grass grows diffrent there.
  my grandfather reported it to the radio station and to the news, but they did not follow up on it. he also notified law enforce we also did not follow up on it.
  my mother just told me about this yesterday when i was helping here move into his house . since my grand fathers death
content.summary: Landing

content.detailedDescription: I work nights at dell childrens hospital and i was peering out of my patients window when i saw this strange object floating in the air.  it was about the size of an airplane, but definitely not an airplane.  it was glowing green.  it was strange because it almost seemed to know i spotted it because when i went to get my phone to take a picture it was gone.
content.summary: I saw a small strange aircraft hovering over my place of work

content.detailedDescription: Something above the earth shot a pulse of some kind in to our yard. there are beings that above humans. it's becomming a scary experience for my family and i. they are able to control people's minds to some extent.
content.summary: Prepare yourselves.
